featured.text: On the basis of the clues, can you predict the of the story? (A) outcome (B) headline (C) cause (D) performance 5.

definition.zh_def: 報紙或文章的標題，通常用來吸引讀者的注意。
definition.en_def: The title of a newspaper article or a story, often designed to attract attention.
definition.example: The headline of the article caught my eye immediately.
